    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Particle arrangements in solids, liquids and gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikelvorbereitungen in den Körpern, in den 
Flüssigkeiten und in den Gasen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Agencements de particules en solides, liquides et
gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arranjos da partícula nos sólidos, nos líquidos
e nos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disposizioni della particella in solidi, liquidi e
gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρυθμίσεις μορίων στα στερεά, τα υγρά και τα αέρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arreglos de la partícula en sólidos, líquidos 
y gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the particle arrangements in solids, liquids and gases. Particles in gases are much farther apart than those in solids and liquids.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particle arrangement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particle separation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die 
Partikelvorbereitungen in den Körpern, in den Flüssigkeiten und in 
den Gasen. Partikel in den Gasen sind viel weiteres getrennt als
die in den Körpern und in den Flüssigkeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare les agencements de 
particules en solides, liquides et gaz. Les particules en gaz 
sont distantes beaucoup plus lointain que ceux dans les solides et les
liquides.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara os arranjos da 
partícula nos sólidos, nos líquidos e nos gáses. As 
partículas nos gáses estão umas separadas muito mais distante do 
que aquelas nos sólidos e nos líquidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta le disposizioni 
della particella in solidi, liquidi e gas. Le particelle in gas 
sono diverso molto più lontano che quelle in solidi ed in liquidi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τις ρυθμίσεις μορίων στα 
στερεά, τα υγρά και τα αέρια. Τα μόρια στα αέρια είναι 
πολύς μακρύτερα χώρια από εκείνοι στα στερεά και τα υγρά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara los arreglos de la 
partícula en sólidos, líquidos y gases. Las partículas en 
gases están separadas mucho más lejano que ésos en sólidos y 
líquidos.</string>
          </description>
